This package contains:

    mod_perl, Version 2.0.12
    libapreq2, Version 2.16

built using the 64-bit compiler in Platform SDK for Windows Server 2003 R2 on
Windows 11 Pro Version 21H2 (64-bit) for use with:

    Apache HTTP Server, Version 2.4.52,
        Apache Lounge Distribution (Win64), 20 December 2021
    Perl Programming Language, Version 5.32.1,
        Strawberry Perl (64-bit), Build 5.32.1.1-64bit

Install the Apache Lounge distribution into C:\Apache24 and Strawberry Perl into
C:\Strawberry, then copy the Apache24 and Strawberry folders from this package
over the top of those installations.

See the following websites for further information on the installation,
configuration and use of this software:

    Apache HTTP Server .................. https://httpd.apache.org/
    Apache Lounge ....................... https://www.apachelounge.com/
    Perl Programming Language ........... https://www.perl.org/
    Strawberry Perl ..................... https://strawberryperl.com/
    Comprehensive Perl Archive Network .. https://www.cpan.org/
    Apache mod_perl Library ............. https://perl.apache.org/
    Apache HTTP Request Library ......... https://httpd.apache.org/apreq/

Steve Hay <steve.m.hay@googlemail.com>
06 February 2022
